channel.title: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?
channel.description: i got a delta-scape source and there is no item.cfg folder to do item bonuses. i recently added new items and need to know how to do the bonuses for them?? what folder??

item.title: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

youre not looking for a folder, youre looking for a file in the main folder, unless it has been moved to a different spot such as config, data, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?

item.source: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?

item.title: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Config > Item.cfg, The .cfg won’t appear as that’s the files actual extension,
And for the bonuses;

item = 4151 Abyssal_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0

Most of the 0’s would be your bonuses, You change them to your wanted one,
But you’ll have to figure out which 0’s, It might tell you

Read full topic
item.source: Adding item bonuses for delta-scape source?
